name: Broken News
description:
You are a disgraced news reporter, having lost your integrity after writing nothing but fake news and libel. Find that journalistic spirit again with this satirical point-and-click puzzle game about making (technically) unbiased and truthful articles.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Press Enter to advance through the tutorial textbox. Use the mouse to interact with your surroundings.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ben Kurtin - programmer, director

Teagan Messenger-Nyborg - artist

Ezra Sandzer-bell (www.audiocipher.com) and Chris Gruchacz (www.chrisgruchacz.com) - music and sound effects

Cole Messenger-Nyborg, Phuong Huynh, and Esai DeJesus - Boss, Female Protagonist, Male Protagonist

(*Pronunciations: Gruchacz is pronounced like grew-hawz, Phuong is pronounced like fwong, Huynh is pronounced like hwin, Esai is pronouced like ee-sai, and DeJesus is pronounced like dey hey-soos.)
